Reviews.Title: RCA 21" TV
Reviews.Author: M. P. Wilson
Reviews.Content: This is a small, light weight unit, with a decent picture.  I needed a flat screen TV to mount from the ceiling between the Kitchen  and dining room.  Due to 8 foot ceilings, size and appearence were important.  This unit is what was necessary to fit the small area between room sections allowing watching from either room. The ceiling mount bracket I purchased allows the set to swivel to face either room.  The sound is fair, a little on the tinny side, even with internal adjustments.  The speaker unit is behind the TV, projecting the sound in the wrong direction, but in a small area, it is not a big issue. Sitting at the counter in the kitchen or at the dining room table, viewing this TV is a pleasure.

Reviews.Title: Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: michael boone
Reviews.Content: It is supposed to have great resloution.  It, sadly does not.  I was very disappointed by the poor picture quality
